Bash(connections" error during training.

Problem:
- reset() called _init_simulation() every time
- Created new CtrlAviary (new PyBullet connection) each reset
- Never closed old connections
- PyBullet has max 128 connections, training hit limit after ~50 episodes

Solution:
- Only create CtrlAviary once (first reset)
- Reuse existing environment on subsequent resets
- Just call sim_env.reset() to reset state
- Properly close connection in close() method (already implemented)

Changes:
- src/rl/mpc_tuning_env.py:230-231
  Added: if self.sim_env is None: check before _init_simulation()
  
This allows training to run indefinitely without connection leaks.

Testing:
- All environment tests pass
- Training can now exceed 1,000+ steps without connection errors
